00015         public struct TRIVERTEX
00016         {
00017             public int x;
00018             public int y;
00019             public ushort Red;
00020             public ushort Green;
00021             public ushort Blue;
00022             public ushort Alpha;
00023             public TRIVERTEX(int x, int y, Color color)
00024                 : this(x, y, color.R, color.G, color.B, color.A)
00025             {
00026             }
00027             public TRIVERTEX(
00028                 int x, int y,
00029                 ushort red, ushort green, ushort blue,
00030                 ushort alpha)
00031             {
00032                 this.x = x;
00033                 this.y = y;
00034                 this.Red = (ushort)(red << 8);
00035                 this.Green = (ushort)(green << 8);
00036                 this.Blue = (ushort)(blue << 8);
00037                 this.Alpha = (ushort)(alpha << 8);
00038             }
00039         }
00040 
00041         public struct GRADIENT_RECT
00042         {
00043             public uint UpperLeft;
00044             public uint LowerRight;
00045             public GRADIENT_RECT(uint ul, uint lr)
00046             {
00047                 this.UpperLeft = ul;
00048                 this.LowerRight = lr;
00049             }
00050         }

00052         public sealed class Win32Helper
00053         {
00054             [DllImport("coredll.dll", SetLastError = true, EntryPoint = "GradientFill")]

00056                 IntPtr hdc,
00057                 TRIVERTEX[] pVertex,
00058                 uint dwNumVertex,
00059                 GRADIENT_RECT[] pMesh,
00060                 uint dwNumMesh,
00061                 uint dwMode);
00062 
00063             public const int GRADIENT_FILL_RECT_H = 0x00000000;
00064             public const int GRADIENT_FILL_RECT_V = 0x00000001;
00065 
00066     }
